Task.Title: Test sections for REST API autopatching - parameterized fixlet - Universal
Task.Description: This is sample Fixlet which will show to read library from embeded Fixlet Enter the required information below and click on take action.

MIMEField.Name: parametermetadatatag
MIMEField.Value: { "SectionAutopatchInfo":{ "Name": "SectionAutopatchInfo", "Title": "Autopatch Selection", "UIType": "accordion", "Values":[ { "Name": "TargetOS", "Title": "Target Operating System:", "Description": "Select the target operating system.", "UIType": "Select", "Required":"1", "DataType" : "Text", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of (\"Windows\";\"Windows\")" }, { "Name": "Application", "Title": "Application:", "Description": "Select the Application to patch.", "UIType": "Select", "Required":"1", "DataType" : "Text", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of (\"iTunes\";\"iTunes\")" } ] }, "SectionServerInfo":{ "Name": "SectionServerInfo", "Title": "Root Server Info", "UIType": "accordion", "Values":[ { "Name": "currentConsoleUser", "Title": "Console User Name:", "Description": "Your console operator user name.", "UIType": "Select", "Required":"1", "DataType" : "Text", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of names of current console users", "Disabled": "true" }, { "Name": "realpassword", "Title": "Console Password:", "Description": "Enter your console operator password.", "UIType": "Textbox", "Required":"1", "Encrypt":"true", "SubUIType":"Password" }, { "Name": "verifypassword", "Title": "Verify Password:", "Description": "Enter your console operator password.", "UIType": "Textbox", "Required": "1", "Encrypt": "true", "SubUIType": "Password", "Parent": "realpassword", "CustomValidator": "validatePassword" }, { "Name": "currentSiteName", "Title": "Site Name:", "Description": "Site Name where content will be created.", "UIType": "Select", "Required": "1", "DataType" : "Text", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of names of sites of current fixlets", "Disabled": "true" }, { "Name": "currentSiteType", "Title": "Site Type:", "Description": "Site Type of the site above.", "UIType": "Select", "Required": "1", "DataType" : "Text", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of ( (if (operator site flag of it) then \"operator\" else if (custom site flag of it) then \"custom\" else ERROR \"none\") of sites of current fixlets )", "Disabled": "true" }, { "Name": "RootServerURL", "Title": "Root Server:", "Description": "Root Server with Port", "UIType": "Select", "Required": "1", "ValueType": "relevance", "Values": "unique values of following texts of firsts \"//\" of urls of current bes servers", "Disabled": "true" }] } }

MIMEField.Name: ParameterValidatorTag
